mainText:
I'm sorry to hear Steve Jobs has passed away. I send my condolences to his friends and family. I'm 11 and greatly inspired by him. He is someone that has changed tecnology in an amazing way. And he will always be remembered. 
 He was also a great inspiration to everyone inculding myself. He has motivated so many others as well. Steve Jobs is remembered and always will be.
author: Tori
